message:
add more specs (#47)

* add html methods specs

* add content specs

* add wrap specs

* add declMod spec

* remove old fixtures

* configure master builds only

Add Object.assign polyfill for dist (#62)

fixes issue with IE11
the same naming options with fs (#116)
Move react and react-dom to perDependencies
Up to date deps and add scripts for travis

Add typings (#181)

* WIP: d.ts

* more types

* signature

* docs(d.ts): Add core declarations

* docs(d.ts): Export bem-react-core from package

* We dont need react types in deps

* Some fixes

* export typings in package.json

* We dont need lib.d.ts

* rewrite to en
chore(tools): Improve pre-commit hooks & dist cmd
chore: add script for publish next version
chore: remove all meta info from root package
chore: update react and react-dom dependencies
chore: remove typedoc and publish old site
chore: remove version from root monorepo
chore: update typings for jest and enzyme
refactor: use testing-library instead of enzyme
